message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm confident you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $110. It's a great deal, if I do say so myself!
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. I'm willing to pay a fair price, but I'm on a tight budget. Can you meet me at $90?

I understand that you're on a tight budget, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $90. However, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'll sell the product to you for $105. It's a fair compromise, and I think you'll still get a great deal.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm willing to pay $98 for the product. Can you consider this offer?

I understand that you're still a bit short on budget, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $98. I'm willing to make one more compromise. I'll sell the product to you for $107. It's the lowest price I'm willing to accept, but I think it's still a great deal for you.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to pay $102 for the product. Can you meet me at this price?

I understand that you're still trying to get the best deal, Bob, but I'm not willing to go any lower than $110. I've already compromised a lot, and I think this is the best price I can offer. If you're not willing to meet me at this price, I'll have to consider selling the product to someone else.
